availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Cornell (Louisville, Kentucky, club owner.)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, club owner. Kentucky native. Son of Janette Cornell Roberts. Married to Evaline Powell Cornell in Jefferson County, Kentucky on April 7, 1863.. Father of Lilly and Parker Cornell. River Clerk in Louisville, Kentucky in 1860. Owner of Hudson Hall club, a bar and coffee house, in Louisville, Kentucky in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Edwards' Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business Firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville, for 1865-6 (Louisville, KY: Edwards, Greenough & Deved, Publishers, 1865), 256.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film # 000819616.
